        from - the date from which to calculate inflation rate
        to - the date to which inflation rate must be detected

      • getPartialInflationBetween

        protected double getPartialInflationBetween(java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double> sir)
         Generates the "product" part of the Inflation Rate Change formula:
 (irc1/100 + 1) x (irc2/100 + 1) x ... x (ircn/100 + 1)
 which still has to be converted to % change. Full formula:
 IRCfrom-to = [ (irc1/100 + 1) x (irc2/100 + 1) x ... x (ircn/100 + 1) - 1] x 100

      • getPartialInflationBetweenAll

        protected double getPartialInflationBetweenAll(java.lang.Long firstPeriod,
                                               java.lang.Long lastPeriod,
                                               java.util.SortedMap<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double> sir)
        Generates inflation rates delta for all intermediate periods (for testing)
        See Also:
        #getInflationBetween(Long, Long, SortedMap)
